ch.nolix.system.client

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable<Server>, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetServer

    public class Server
extends ClosableElement
implements Clearable<Server>
    A server contains applications and listens to clients on a specific port. A server is clearable and closable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
